name: lex-ai
description: AI-powered contract reviewer for AWS Lambda Hackathon

scripts.build: cd frontend && npm run build && cd ../backend && npm run build
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run deploy:backend
scripts.install:all: cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.clean: cd frontend && rm -rf .next node_modules && cd ../backend && rm -rf node_modules dist

author: Lex AI Team
